function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High COVID-19 infection rate in the U.S. despite having 4.25% of the world's population","Impact":"Disproportionate burden of infective cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective community mitigation strategies and increasing public compliance","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, public health campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare workers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Positivity rate of COVID-19 tests in the U.S. above recommended levels","Impact":"Risk of reopening before achieving recommended positivity rate","Mitigation":"Conducting more testing and implementing stricter community mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Testing technologies, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Health agencies, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity and disparities at the state level in meeting positivity recommendations","Impact":"Uneven implementation of community mitigation strategies and variable public compliance","Mitigation":"Targeted support and resources for states with low compliance, and sharing best practices among states","Technologies":"Data analytics, resource allocation technologies","People":"State officials, healthcare workers, local communities","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
